name: 敏迪·卡灵 Mindy Kaling
intro: Vera Chokalingam (born June 24, 1979), professionally known as Mindy Kaling, is an Indian American actress, comedian, writer and producer who played Kelly Kapoor on the NBC sitcom The Office and currently stars in The Mindy Project, a show which she developed. Kaling is also a co-executive producer and writer of several of the show's episodes.
